DOC.brief_summary: This is a prospective study of patients with stroke with accompanying motor and visual deficits. There will be patients' evaluations at 2 time points at the acute and subacute period after the stroke. Statistical correlation of the improvement of their deficits will be conducted
DOC.brief_title: Correlation of Visual and Motor Deficits in Stroke Patients
DOC.criteria: acute phase stroke patients with motor and visual deficits previous stroke, neurologic disease or visual deficit
DOC.keyword: course of motor and visual rehabilitation
